name: Accurate
text: You may re-roll hit rolls of 1.

name: Assault
text: If target is within 8", this attack rolls +1D6

name: Blast (2")
text: If this attack hits, make a (2D6, 4+, AP0, D1) attack against every other model within 2" of the hit model. These attacks are not affected by any modifiers.

Choose one or both of the attacks below. If you choose both, then make attacks with both profiles at -1 to hit:
  • Boltgun: ( 24", 2D6, 3+, AP0, D1 )
  • Flamer: ( 8", 2D6, 3+, AP0, D1 ) {rule=SPRAY}

Choose one or both of the attacks below. If you choose both, then make attacks with both profiles at -1 to hit:
  • Boltgun: ( 24", 2D6, 3+, AP0, D1 )
  • Grav: ( 18", 2D6, 3+, AP3, D1 ) {rule=GRAV}

Choose one or both of the attacks below. If you choose both, then make attacks with both profiles at -1 to hit:
  • Boltgun: ( 24", 2D6, 3+, AP0, D1 )
  • Plasma: ( 18", 2D6, 3+, AP2, D1 ) {rule=PLASMA}

name: Crit AP1
text: Each hit roll of a natural 6 is resolved with AP1

name: Crit AP4
text: Each hit roll of a natural 6 is resolved with AP4

name: Crit D2
text: Each hit roll of a natural 6 is resolved with D2

name: Crit Double Hit
text: Each hit roll of a natural 6 causes 2 hits instead of 1

name: Crit Triple Hit
text: Each hit roll of a natural 6 causes 3 hits instead of 1

name: Crit Mortal Wound
text: Each hit roll of a natural 6 causes 1 mortal wound in addition to the normal damage

name: Drill
text: Every hit rolled counts as an exploding 6 result and so another die can be rolled

name: Explodes!
text: This model suffers a direct wound for every hit roll of a natural 1.

name: Grav
text: If the target has an AR of 3+ or better, this attack gains D2

name: Grenade
text: This attack ignores all modifiers to hit and armour rolls

Choose one of the following grenade types:
  • Frag: ( 24", 2D6, 3+, AP0, D1 ) {rule=BLAST}
  • Krak: ( 24", 1D6, 3+, AP2, D2 )

Choose one of the following grenade types:
  • Frag: ( 24", 2D6, 4+, AP0, D1 ) {rule=BLAST}
  • Krak: ( 24", 1D6, 4+, AP2, D2 )

name: Heavy Weapon
text: This attack is a long action. This attack does not suffer the long range modifier.

name: Ignore Cover
text: This attack ignores modifiers for obscured and cover.

Choose one or both of the attacks below. If you choose both, then make attacks with both profiles at -1 to hit:
  • Shoota: ( 18", 2D6, 5+, AP0, D1 )
  • Rokkit Launcha: ( 24", 1D6, 5+, AP4, D3 )

Choose one or both of the attacks below. If you choose both, then make attacks with both profiles at -1 to hit:
  • Shoota: ( 18", 2D6, 5+, AP0, D1 )
  • Skorcha: ( 8", 4D6, 4+, AP1, D1 ) {rule=SPRAY}

name: Long Range
text: This model does not suffer the -1 hit penalty when making an attack at long range

name: Melta Blast
text: If target is within 6", this attack is D4

name: Melee Shot
text: This attack may be performed while engaged. This attack may target models that are engaged with this model or other models.

Choose one of the following missile types:
  • Frag: ( 48", 3D6, 3+, AP0, D1 ) {rule=BLAST}
  • Krak: ( 48", 2D6, 3+, AP2, D2 )

Choose one of the following missile types:
  • Frag: ( 48", 3D6, 4+, AP0, D1 ) {rule=BLAST}
  • Krak: ( 48", 2D6, 4+, AP2, D2 )

name: Plasma
text: You may choose to supercharge when making this attack. If you do, then this attack gains AP4 and D2, however if any hit dice rolls a 1 then this model is immediately removed from play.

name: Rapid Fire
text: You may perform this attack against 2 different targets, as long as they are within 2" of each other. Make separate hit rolls with their own modifiers.

name: Scoped
text: This model always gets the aiming bonus as if they have taken the Aim action

Choose one of the following wave types:
  • Long-Wave: ( 24", 4D6, 4+, AP0, D1 )
  • Short-Wave: ( 12", 2D6, 4+, AP2, D2 )

name: Shock
text: If this attack hits, it does no damage; instead the target is marked as fatigued.

name: Close Quarters
text: If target is within 6", this attack rolls 3D6 and AP1

name: Slow Attack
text: This attack is a long action

name: Sniper Weapon
text: This attack is a long action. This attack is not affected by the long range modifier and always gets the aim modifier.

name: Spray
text: This attack targets every model under the spray template and within range. These attacks are not affected by the obscured or cover modifiers.

name: Web
text: If this attack hits, the target does not make an armour roll and it deals no damage. Instead the target's SP is reduced to 0 until the end of the turn.
